snippet: The opening day of the Australian Open should provide quick answers to injury questions which developed over the past few weeks with two of the biggest stars in the women's game....
lead_paragraph: The opening day of the Australian Open should provide quick answers to injury questions which developed over the past few weeks with two of the biggest stars in the women's game.

headline.print_headline: What to Watch on Monday at the Australian Open
